/usr/bin/c++    -std=c++11    CMakeFiles/Hexapod.dir/src/Hexapod.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Hexapod.dir/src/SocketServer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Hexapod.dir/src/LegCtrl.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Hexapod.dir/src/Servo.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Hexapod.dir/src/Object.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Hexapod.dir/src/InverseKinematic.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Hexapod.dir/src/WaveGait.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Hexapod.dir/src/RippleGait.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Hexapod.dir/src/Parser.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Hexapod.dir/src/Movement.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Hexapod.dir/src/TripodGait.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Hexapod.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Hexapod.dir/src/Leg.cpp.o  -o Hexapod -rdynamic -lboost_date_time -lboost_filesystem -lboost_system -lcurses -lform -lpthread
